page.title: 03KILBURN(DERBY)AREA TRANSPORT
page.content:
Running North/South through the centre of our area is the busy dual carriageway A38, built a few years ago
to link the M1 and the A5. The volume of traffic on this road has led to repairs already and a high noise level. Slower_moving traffic, more local traffic, uses mainly the A61 Ripley_Derby road and the A609 Belper_Ilkeston. The area is well_served by public transport, not all homes possessing a car and there being a significant proportion of elderly residents. There is no public railway service in the area, Belper being the nearest station. There is a small mineral railway which has a small number of trains daily.
